title: The Basic Art of Christmas Dinner
description: The Basic Art of Christmas Dinner is part of the Gourmand World Cookbook series by Celebrity Chef Maria Liberati. The book series is also a best selling book series and is sold thorughout the World. Contains menus, recipes, charming Holiday stories, decorating tips for Christmas Eve, The Feast of the Seven Fishes and Christmas and the lovely stories about author;s life in the mountains of Italy. Former international supermodel turned Celebrity Chef Maria Liberati is considered one of the foremost experts on Italian cuisine and culture. Maria was granted a trademark for The Basic Art of Italian Cooking by Maria Liberati tm and it is now a blog with over 100,000 subscribers.
author: Maria Liberati
